column1: The mere saying that there was a breach of natural justice will not be accepted as proof. Their
silence during the arbitration is the consent of the parties for arbitration.

T
herefore, I see no grounds to disturb the judgment entered in case No: Writ 2/12 dated 17.12.2015
by the Provincial High Court Judge of Kandy.
Judge of the Court of Appeal
Judge of the Court of Appeal
